title: Consistent Lag Spikes
body:
I've recently (perhaps the last 2 patches) been experiencing lag spikes (up to 3.6K ping) at random. I do not disconnect and voice comms is also fine during the time, but the ping sky rockets.

I've tested my internet and other games and everything is fine there.

I was wondering if this were happening to anyone else and how you would go about fixing it. 

Thanks.

replies.body: 400-800 ping spikes and sometimes constant on ARAM games.  What is going on???
